doc.name: HSMMTimeAwareGenerator
doc.description: This actor implements an Explicit-Duration Hidden-Markov Model (EDHMM) and executes this model to generates traces. This subclass assumes that the state transitions of the EDHMM are characterized by a set of transition matrices, each active for a certain time interval. By default, the actor expects to receive a set of hourly specifications for the transition matrix, and a sampling period with which to produce observations.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
